data.actual_result: At the very bottom of the flag the top of the flag is visible
data.expected_result: The flag should be normal and not repeat
data.short_description: Server Region Flag begins to Repeat at the bottom when at 90 zoom
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Appearance in user settings and set zoom to 90 - Go to a server you have access to manage server on - Set the region to a region that has a flag with a different color at the top compared to the bottom (Such as Australia) - Observe
